item.title: Proxmox Wake-On-LAN - alx driver patch
item.description: At home, I use my old computer as a Proxmox server. To start my server from another computer in the same LAN or from a different LAN, I use Wake-on-LAN. Unfortunately, the alx driver is disabled by default since it breaks for some kernels. The bugtrack can be found here Download the patch wget -O patch.tar.gz https://bugzilla.kernel.org/attachment.cgi?id=284877 Extract the archive mkdir ./patch tar xvzf patch.tar.gz -C ./patch Add the PVE No-Subscription repo to the apt sources and install the current kernel headers echo "deb http://download.
